hint_keys_note: Use A~K and WERTY to play notes.
help_midi_editor:
A: Add note
T: Add track
Left Arrow: Select previous note
Right Arrow: Select next note
Up Arrow: Switch to previous track
Down Arrow: Switch to next track
W/S: Pitch +1/-1
Q/E: Note length -/+ 0.125 (min 0.125)
Z/X: Start time -/+ 0.25 (min 0.0)
I: Switch instrument
L: Type instrument name (press L, type instrument name, then press Enter to confirm)
Enter: Generate score image
Mouse wheel: Zoom score
Mouse drag: Scroll up/down
ESC: Exit
H: Show/Hide this help

Instrument List:
1: piano
2: acoustic guitar
3: electric guitar
4: violin
5: cello
6: contrabass
7: flute
8: clarinet
9: trumpet
10: trombone
11: saxophone
12: drums
13: harp
14: organ
15: voice

Use I to cycle instruments, or L to type the instrument name (e.g., 'violin') and press Enter.
toggle_score_hint: Press Space to show/hide score image
output_midi: O: Output Midi File and Download
midi_downloaded: MIDI file has been downloaded to: {}
midi_ready_to_open: MIDI file is ready to open.
